Defines the auto-completion behavior of the combobox.

- `autohighlight`: The first focused option is highlighted as the user types
- `autocomplete`: Navigating the listbox with the arrow keys selects the option and the input is updated

startOfWeek.description:
The first day of the week.
 `0` - Sunday
 `1` - Monday
 `2` - Tuesday
 `3` - Wednesday
 `4` - Thursday
 `5` - Friday
 `6` - Saturday

fixedWeeks.description:
Whether the calendar should have a fixed number of weeks.
This renders the calendar with 6 weeks instead of 5 or 6.

selectionMode.description:
The selection mode of the calendar.
- `single` - only one date can be selected
- `multiple` - multiple dates can be selected
- `range` - a range of dates can be selected

modal.description:
Whether the calendar should be modal. This means that the calendar will
block interaction with the rest of the page, and trap focus within it.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the editable. Useful for composition.

invalid.description: Whether the input's value is invalid.

name.description: The name attribute of the editable component. Used for form submission.

form.description: The associate form of the underlying input.

autoResize.description: Whether the editable should auto-resize to fit the content.

activationMode.description:
The activation mode for the preview element.

- "focus" - Enter edit mode when the preview element is focused
- "dblclick" - Enter edit mode when the preview element is double-clicked
- "none" - No interaction with the preview element will trigger edit mode.

submitMode.description:
The action that triggers submit in the edit mode:

- "enter" - Trigger submit when the enter key is pressed
- "blur" - Trigger submit when the editable is blurred
- "none" - No action will trigger submit. You need to use the submit button
- "both" - Pressing `Enter` and blurring the input will trigger submit

startWithEditView.description: Whether to start with the edit mode active.

selectOnFocus.description: Whether to select the text in the input when it is focused.

value.description: The value of the editable in both edit and preview mode

maxLength.description: The maximum number of characters allowed in the editable

onSubmit.description: The callback that is called when the editable's value is submitted.

onEdit.description: The callback that is called when in the edit mode.

placeholder.description: The placeholder value to show when the `value` is empty

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

finalFocusEl.description:
The element that should receive focus when the editable is closed.
By default, it will focus on the trigger element.

spinOnPress.description: Whether to spin the value when the increment/decrement button is pressed

pages.description: The page range. Represented as an array of page numbers (including ellipsis)

pageRange.description: The page range. Represented as an object with `start` and `end` properties.

slice.description: Function to slice an array of data based on the current page.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the popover. Useful for composition.

modal.description:
Whether the popover should be modal. When set to `true`:
- interaction with outside elements will be disabled
- only popover content will be visible to screen readers
- scrolling is blocked
- focus is trapped within the popover

portalled.description: Whether the popover is rendered in a portal

autoFocus.description:
Whether to automatically set focus on the first focusable
content within the popover when opened.

initialFocusEl.description: The element to focus on when the popover is opened.

closeOnInteractOutside.description: Whether to close the popover when the user clicks outside of the popover.

closeOnEsc.description: Whether to close the popover when the escape key is pressed.

setNode.description: Function to set the node (as early as possible)

onPress.description: Handler that is called when the press is released over the target.

onPressStart.description: Handler that is called when a press interaction starts.

onPressEnd.description:
Handler that is called when a press interaction ends, either
over the target or when the pointer leaves the target.

onPressUp.description:
Handler that is called when a press is released over the target, regardless of
whether it started on the target or not.

onLongPress.description: Handler that is called when the element has been pressed for 500 milliseconds

preventFocusOnPress.description: Whether the target should not receive focus on press.

cancelOnPointerExit.description:
Whether press events should be canceled when the pointer leaves the target while pressed.

By default, this is `false`, which means if the pointer returns back over the target while
still pressed, onPressStart will be fired again.

If set to `true`, the press is canceled when the pointer leaves the target and
onPressStart will not be fired if the pointer returns.

allowTextSelectionOnPress.description: Whether text selection should be enabled on the pressable element.

longPressDelay.description: The amount of time (in milliseconds) to wait before firing the `onLongPress` event.

getThumbPercent.description: Returns the percent of the thumb at the given index.

setThumbPercent.description: Sets the percent of the thumb at the given index.

getThumbMin.description: Returns the min value of the thumb at the given index.

getThumbMax.description: Returns the max value of the thumb at the given index.

increment.description: Function to increment the value of the slider at the given index.

decrement.description: Function to decrement the value of the slider at the given index.

focus.description: Function to focus the slider. This focuses the first thumb.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the range slider. Useful for composition.

aria-label.description: The aria-label of each slider thumb. Useful for providing an accessible name to the slider

aria-labelledby.description: The `id` of the elements that labels each slider thumb. Useful for providing an accessible name to the slider

name.description: The name associated with each slider thumb (when used in a form)

form.description: The associate form of the underlying input element.

value.description: The value of the range slider

onChange.description: Function invoked when the value of the slider changes

onChangeStart.description: Function invoked when the slider value change is started

onChangeEnd.description: Function invoked when the slider value change is done

getAriaValueText.description: Function that returns a human readable value for the slider thumb

min.description: The minimum value of the slider

max.description: The maximum value of the slider

step.description: The step value of the slider

minStepsBetweenThumbs.description: The minimum permitted steps between multiple thumbs.

thumbAlignment.description:
The alignment of the slider thumb relative to the track
- `center`: the thumb will extend beyond the bounds of the slider track.
- `contain`: the thumb will be contained within the bounds of the track.

hoveredValue.description: The value of the currently hovered rating

size.description: The maximum value of the rating group

sizeArray.description: The array of rating values. Returns an array of numbers from 1 to the max value.

getRatingState.description: Returns the state of a rating item

selectOnTab.description:
Whether to select the highlighted option when the user presses Tab,
and the menu is open.

onHighlight.description: The callback fired when the highlighted option changes.

decrement.description: Function to decrement the value of the slider by the step.

value.description: The value of the slider

min.description: The minimum value of the slider

step.description: The step value of the slider

- "start": Useful when the value represents an absolute value
- "center": Useful when the value represents an offset (relative)

onChangeEnd.description: Function invoked when the slider value change is done

The alignment of the slider thumb relative to the track
- `center`: the thumb will extend beyond the bounds of the slider track.
- `contain`: the thumb will be contained within the bounds of the track.

bounds.description: The bounds of the currently dragged splitter handle.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the switch. Useful for composition.

label.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

focusable.description:
If `true` and `disabled` is passed, the switch will
remain tabbable but not interactive

readOnly.description: If `true`, the switch will be readonly

invalid.description: If `true`, the switch is marked as invalid.

required.description: If `true`, the switch input is marked as required,

onChange.description: Function to call when the switch is clicked.

name.description:
The name of the input field in a switch
(Useful for form submission).

form.description: The id of the form that the switch belongs to

value.description: The value of switch input. Useful for form submission.
The current value of the tabs.

focusedValue.description: The value of the tab that is currently focused.

previousValues.description: The previous values of the tabs in sequence of selection.

setValue.description: Sets the value of the tabs.

clearValue.description: Clears the value of the tabs.

setIndicatorRect.description: Sets the indicator rect to the tab with the given id.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; trigger: string; tablist: string; content: string; indicator: string; }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the tabs. Useful for composition.

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

loop.description: Whether the keyboard navigation will loop from last tab to first, and vice versa.

value.description: The selected tab id

orientation.description:
The orientation of the tabs. Can be `horizontal` or `vertical`
- `horizontal`: only left and right arrow key navigation will work.
- `vertical`: only up and down arrow key navigation will work.

activationMode.description:
The activation mode of the tabs. Can be `manual` or `automatic`
- `manual`: Tabs are activated when clicked or press `enter` key.
- `automatic`: Tabs are activated when receiving focus

onChange.description: Callback to be called when the selected/active tab changes

onFocus.description: Callback to be called when the focused tab changes

onDelete.description: Callback to be called when a tab's close button is clicked

inputValue.description: The value of the tags entry input.

value.description: The value of the tags as an array of strings.

valueAsString.description: The value of the tags as a string.

isAtMax.description: Whether the tags have reached the max limit.

setValue.description: Function to set the value of the tags.

clearValue.description: Function to clear the value of the tags.

addValue.description: Function to add a tag to the tags.

setValueAtIndex.description: Function to set the value of a tag at the given index.

setInputValue.description: Function to set the value of the tags entry input.

clearInputValue.description: Function to clear the value of the tags entry input.

focus.description: Function to focus the tags entry input.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; input: string; clearBtn: string; label: string; control: string; tag(opts: TagProps): string; }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the tags input. Useful for composition.

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

maxLength.description: The max length of the input.

delimiter.description:
The character that serves has:
- event key to trigger the addition of a new tag
- character used to split tags when pasting into the input

autoFocus.description: Whether the input should be auto-focused

disabled.description: Whether the tags input should be disabled

readOnly.description: Whether the tags input should be read-only

invalid.description: Whether the tags input is invalid

allowEditTag.description:
Whether a tag can be edited after creation.
If `true` and focus is on a tag, pressing `Enter`or double clicking will edit the tag.

value.description: The tag values

onChange.description: Callback fired when the tag values is updated

onHighlight.description: Callback fired when a tag is focused by pointer or keyboard navigation

onInvalid.description: Callback fired when the max tag count is reached or the `validateTag` function returns `false`

onTagUpdate.description: Callback fired when a tag's value is updated

validate.description:
Returns a boolean that determines whether a tag can be added.
Useful for preventing duplicates or invalid tag values.

blurBehavior.description:
The behavior of the tags input when the input is blurred
- `"add"`: add the input value as a new tag
- `"none"`: do nothing
- `"clear"`: clear the input value

addOnPaste.description: Whether to add a tag when you paste values into the tag input

allowOverflow.description:
Whether to allow tags to exceed max. In this case,
we'll attach `data-invalid` to the root

name.description: The name attribute for the input. Useful for form submissions

form.description: The associate form of the underlying input element.

placement.description: The current placement of the toast.

isRtl.description: Whether the toast is in RTL mode.

pause.description: Function to pause the toast (keeping it visible).

resume.description: Function to resume the toast dismissing.

dismiss.description: Function to instantly dismiss the toast.

render.description: Function render the toast in the DOM (based on the defined `render` property)

setPressed.description: Function to set the pressed state of the toggle.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

onChange.description: Function to call when the toggle is clicked.

pressed.description: Whether the toggle is initially pressed.

value.description: The values of the toggles in the group.

onChange.description: Function to call when the toggle is clicked.

loop.description: Whether to loop focus inside the toggle group.

rovingFocus.description: Whether to use roving tab index to manage focus.

orientation.description: The orientation of the toggle group.

multiple.description: Whether to allow multiple toggles to be selected.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the tooltip. Useful for composition.

openDelay.description: The open delay of the tooltip.

closeDelay.description: The close delay of the tooltip.

closeOnPointerDown.description: Whether to close the tooltip on pointerdown.

closeOnEsc.description: Whether to close the tooltip when the Escape key is pressed.

interactive.description:
Whether the tooltip's content is interactive.
In this mode, the tooltip will remain open when user hovers over the content.

onOpen.description: Function called when the tooltip is opened.

onClose.description: Function called when the tooltip is closed.

positioning.description: The user provided options used to position the popover content
